name: The King of Fighters '97
overview: The King of Fighters 1997 begins! 29 characters to choose from! In addition to 2 new teams and 7 returning teams, 2 new characters can be found in the Edit Mode. Virtually unlimited choice in an impressive selection of 3,654 team edit combinations. Includes 2 types of playing modes. Which one can you handle - the aggressive Advanced Mode or the simple Extra Mode?
